about: My mission is develop the best platforms around.
description: Hello, I'm Danesh Habibi, a front-end developer with over 3 years of experience in web development and design, I bring a unique blend of technical expertise, creativity and problem-solving skills to every project. My ability to learn quickly and thrive in fast-paced environments has enabled me to deliver innovative solutions across diverse industries. My expertise in Front-end development includes extensive experience with React, Redux, Next.js, and Back-end development such as Php, Laravel, Restful API. I have gained valuable experience as both a team member and leader, having fully developed several projects. I am passionate about using my skills to drive business growth and excited to take on new challenges to gain valuable experiences in the field of computer engineering.
